name: top-k-app-based-job-size-chart
title: Top 15 Big Time Application based on Job Size
subtitle: Average I/O throughput of the Platform big-time appsâ€™ jobs, by job size.

series.query: select real_exe, min(agg_perf_MB) as min_jobsize, avg(agg_perf_MB) as avg_jobsize, max(agg_perf_MB) as max_jobsize, sum(total_bytes) as total_bytes, sum(runtime) as runtime, sum(iotime) as iotime from jobs_all group by real_exe order by max_jobsize desc limit 15
